biotools.summary: Alignment-based sequence extraction software (ALiBaSeq) is designed to retrieve homologous regions from a FASTA file with contigs (e.g., an NGS read assembly file). The retrieval is done based on reading BLAST, HMMER, or LASTZ search tab-delimited output tables or SAM / BAM alignment files and then searching for the results in an assembly file.
